subject: Order #SSN1729
description_text:
Hi, I contacted support previously about purchasing pedals. I asked to
declare a lower value on the customs declaration, since my country has very
high taxes.

You asked me to send my order number here so you could make a note to avoid
mistakes.
My last ticket: https://simsonn.freshdesk.com/support/tickets/301

So this is my order number: Order #SSN1729

You can make a declaration with a value of 119.43$

[image: image.png]

conversations.body_text: Hi，Iago Leal，  We can give it a try, but if customs discovers a mismatch between the declaration and the actual contents, they may require additional tax payment. Also, just to confirm—do you only need one motor?

Hi,

I added 2 motors to cart

Em seg., 9 de jun. de 2025 às 11:00, support@simsonn.com <
support@simsonn.com> escreveu:

> Hi，Iago Leal，
>
> We can give it a try, but if customs discovers a mismatch between the
> declaration and the actual contents, they may require additional tax
> payment. Also, just to confirm—do you only need one motor?
>
>
>
Hi，Iago Leal，  After placing your order, please let us know your order number. We will make a note of the declared value to avoid any mistakes.

Ok!
Could I get a discount or shipping coupon?
The tax to my country are very high.

Em seg., 9 de jun. de 2025 às 11:16, support@simsonn.com <
support@simsonn.com> escreveu:

> Hi，Iago Leal，
>
> After placing your order, please let us know your order number. We will
> make a note of the declared value to avoid any mistakes.
>
>
>

ID 号为 301 和 381 的工单已合并到此工单。

合并来自工单301  
      主题: Buy pedals  
      描述:  Hello,  I'm from Brazil and I would like to buy directly from your website. But the customs fees here are very high.  I would like to know if you can declare a lower value on the tax return. like around $100. Maybe I can get a discount coupon?    .

合并来自工单381  
      主题: Order buy  
      描述:  Hi, I contacted support previously about purchasing pedals. I asked to declare a lower value on the customs declaration, since my country has very high taxes.  You asked me to send my order number here so you could make a note to avoid mistakes. My last ticket: https://simsonn.freshdesk.com/support/tickets/301  So this is my order number: Order #SSN1729  You can make a declaration with a value of 119.43$
Hello, just correcting the declared value. Is it possible to declare $180 to reduce taxes?
Please reply to my ticket. It's been 72 hours.   If it's not possible to do this, I would like to cancel the purchase

Hi, with the recent AliExpress promotion, the price with the discounts was good for me. Could you cancel my order made on the website?     I will buy from your official AliExpress store, taxes included
Hi，Iago Leal，  Please hold on a moment — I’m currently coordinating with the operations teams from both platforms.

Hi Iago Leal,     Hi, I apologise for not getting back to you in time, but we received your request and under-reported it for you, so please don't worry. Your order was split into two parcels with the ped declared at $78.73 and the vam declared at a value of $11.73 .
You sent 2 packages, one by DHL and the other by post. Could you tell me which package contains each item?
Hi Iago Leal,  DHL is pedals and postal parcels are VAM motors.
